sentences.en: Dickinson , a bioengineer, has devoted his life's work to the study of insect flight.
sentences.cn: 迪金森是一名生物工程学家, 他一直从事昆虫飞行方面的研究.

sentences.en: Dickinson, a bioengineer, has devoted his life's work to the study of insect flight.
sentences.cn: 迪金森是一名生物工程学家，他一直从事昆虫飞行方面的研究。

sentences.en: Ning Wang, a bioengineer at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, found that the embryonic stem cells of mice are much softer than other, more specialised cells.
sentences.cn: 位于伊利诺伊大学香槟分校的生物工程学家，王宁（音译）发现，老鼠的胚胎干细胞远比其他特化细胞要软。

sentences.en: Pamela yelick a member of the research team predicts that "we will know whether dental stem cells can be manipulated to bioengineer teeth within five years."
sentences.cn: 研究小组成员叶立克预测，五年内ⅸ我们将会了解牙齿的干细胞是否能使用在生物工程牙齿方面。

sentences.en: The company is working on ways to bioengineer better, cleaner and more efficient biofuels.
sentences.cn: 该公司致力于用生物工程技术研发出更好，更清洁，更高效的生物燃料。
